recommended_actions.notes: E sessions (s828, s823, s818) all truncate with 'Let me...' notes, suggesting Phase 3 (close out with ctxly_remember) isn't happening. R#131 consolidated phases but completion issue persists. Check if Phase 3 steps are being skipped or if there's a budget/context issue.

recommended_actions.title: Add B session cost warning for multi-feature work
recommended_actions.notes: B session s829 cost $4.92 (2.7x avg) by implementing 4 features in one session. Consider adding a SESSION_BUILD.md guideline: if assigned work has 3+ queue items, deprioritize lower-priority items to stay under $3.
